price: Enti Yεgyee no so na Yεgyee no fri ͻhaw ne awerεhoͻ no mu, na saa ara na Yεgye agyidiefoͻ no (fri ͻhaw ne mmusuo mu).
arabic: فَٱسۡتَجَبۡنَا لَهُۥ وَنَجَّيۡنَٰهُ مِنَ ٱلۡغَمِّۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُـۨجِي ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fa-is'tajabnā lahu wanajjaynāhu mina al-ghami wakadhālika nunjī al-mu'minīna
